intro: Cautleya lutea var. robusta, commonly known as the robust yellow orchid, is a flowering plant native to Southeast Asia. It belongs to the Orchidaceae family and is characterized by its vibrant yellow flowers and sturdy growth habit. The plant typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as forest understories. Its rhizomatous root system allows it to spread and form dense colonies. The leaves are broad and革质 (leathery), providing structural support and efficient water retention.
